articles.author: RFE/RL
articles.title: Wagner Chief Prigozhin Says Russia's Plan To 'Demilitarize' Ukraine Failed - Radio Free Europe / Radio Liberty
articles.description: The leader of Russia's Wagner private mercenary group, Yevgeny Prigozhin, says Moscow's plan to "demilitarize" Ukraine failed and that the invasion of its neighbor "turned Ukraine's army into one of the most powerful in the world."
articles.content:
British Defense Minister Ben Wallace met with his Ukrainian counterpart, Oleksiy Reznikov, during a surprise visit to Kyiv on May 24, Ukraine's Defense Ministry announced.
